[!IF "GptConfigurationOfOptApiServices/GptDeinitApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "GptConfigurationOfOptApiServices/GptWakeupFunctionalityApi = 'true'"!][!// [!IF "GptDriverConfiguration/GptReportWakeupSource = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "GptConfigurationOfOptApiServices/GptTimeElapsedApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "GptConfigurationOfOptApiServices/GptTimeRemainingApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "GptConfigurationOfOptApiServices/GptEnableDisableNotificationApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$GptInitCheckUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$GptGetModeUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "GptConfigurationOfOptApiServices/GptVersionInfoApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!//
Table 1: Api Usage and SFR access
API Name SFRs Used Remarks
Gpt_Init TOMi_CHx_CTRL,ATOMi_CHx_CTRL[!IF "$OsmUsed = num:i(1)"!], TOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY,TOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN,ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY,ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN [!ENDIF!][!// Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number and x refers to channel number
Gpt_DeInit TOMi_CHx_CTRL,ATOMi_CHx_CTRL,TOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY,TOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN, ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY,ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN,TOMi_CHx_CN0,TOMi_CHx_CM0, TOMi_CHx_SR0,ATOMi_CHx_CN0,ATOMi_CHx_CM0,ATOMi_CHx_SR0 Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number and x refers to channel number
Gpt_StartTimer TOMi_CHx_CN0,TOMi_CHx_CM0,TOMi_CHx_SR0,ATOMi_CHx_CN0,ATOMi_CHx_CM0, ATOMi_CHx_SR0,TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_CTRL,ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_CTRL, TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_STAT,ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_STAT[!IF "$OsmUsed = num:i(1)"!], TOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY,ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY [!ENDIF!][!// Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number, x refers to channel number and y refers to the TGC number(0 or 1)
Gpt_StopTimer TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_CTRL,ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_CTRL,TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_STAT, ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_STAT Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number, x refers to channel number nad y refers to the TGC number(0 or 1)
Gpt_SetMode TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_CTRL,ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_CTRL,TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_STAT, ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_STAT,TOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN,ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number, x refers to channel number nad y refers to the TGC number(0 or 1)
Gpt_EnableWakeup TOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY,TOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN,ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY, ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number and x refers to channel number
Gpt_DisableWakeup TOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY,TOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN,ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY, ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number and x refers to channel number
Gpt_CheckWakeup - No SFRs used
Gpt_GetTimeElapsed TOMi_CHx_CN0,TOMi_CHx_CM0,ATOMi_CHx_CN0,ATOMi_CHx_CM0 Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number and x refers to channel number
Gpt_GetTimeRemaining TOMi_CHx_CN0,TOMi_CHx_CM0,ATOMi_CHx_CN0,ATOMi_CHx_CM0 Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number and x refers to channel number
Gpt_EnableNotification TOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY,TOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN,ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY, ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number and x refers to channel number
Gpt_DisableNotification TOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY,TOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN,ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_NOTIFY, ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN Where i refers to TOM/ATOM module number and x refers to channel number
Gpt_InitCheck Refer SFRs used by Gpt_Init() -
Gpt_GetMode - No SFRs used
Gpt_GetVersionInfo - No SFRs used

 

[!IF "$GptSafetyUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$GptSafetyUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!SELECT "as:modconf('Gpt')[1]"!][!// [!LOOP "./GptChannelConfigSet/*"!][!// [!VAR "GptIndex" = "@index"!][!// [!VAR "MaxChannels"= "num:i(count(GptChannelConfiguration/*))"!][!// [!FOR "ChannelId" = "num:i(1)" TO "num:i($MaxChannels)"!][!// [!SELECT "GptChannelConfiguration/*[GptChannelId = num:i($ChannelId) - num:i(1)]"!][!// [!VAR "ChanId" = "num:i($ChannelId) - num:i(1)"!][!// [!VAR "GtmRef" = "node:path(node:ref(./GptAssignedHwUnit))"!][!// [!IF "contains($GtmRef, '/Tom/') = 'true'"!][!// [!VAR "GtmMod" ="'TOM'"!][!// [!VAR "GtmModuleNumber" = "substring-before ( substring-after($GtmRef,'/Tom_'),'/TomChannel_')"!] [!VAR "GtmChannelNumber" = "substring-after($GtmRef,'/TomChannel_')"!] [!ELSEIF "contains($GtmRef, '/Atom/') = 'true'"!][!// [!VAR "GtmMod" ="'ATOM'"!][!// [!VAR "GtmModuleNumber" = "substring-before ( substring-after($GtmRef,'/Atom_'),'/AtomChannel_')"!] [!VAR "GtmChannelNumber" = "substring-after($GtmRef,'/AtomChannel_')"!] [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$GptSafetyUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!VAR "SignalType" = "GptSignalType"!][!// [!IF "$SignalType = 'GPT_QM_SIGNAL'"!][!// [!VAR "SignalType" = "'QM'"!][!// [!ELSEIF "$SignalType = 'GPT_ASIL_SIGNAL'"!][!// [!VAR "SignalType" = "'ASIL'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$GptSafetyUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!ENDSELECT!][!// [!ENDFOR!][!// [!ENDLOOP!][!// [!ENDSELECT!][!//
Table 2: GPT Configured Channels
GPT Channel GTM Module Module no Channel no Safety level
GPT_Channel_[!"num:i($ChanId)"!] [!"$GtmMod"!] [!"num:i($GtmModuleNumber)"!] [!"num:i($GtmChannelNumber)"!][!"$SignalType"!]

 

[!IF "$GptSafetyUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// /******************************************GPT MPU Settings******************************************/

[!IF "GptDriverConfiguration/GptPBFixedAddress = 'false'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "GptDriverConfiguration/GptPBFixedAddress = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "GptConfigurationOfOptApiServices/GptWakeupFunctionalityApi = 'true'"!][!// [!IF "GptDriverConfiguration/GptReportWakeupSource = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!ENDIF!][!//
Table 3: Common SFR and Memory Range
Start Address End Address Remarks
GPT_START_SEC_VAR_32BIT GPT_STOP_SEC_VAR_32BIT Gpt_kConfigPtr
GPT_START_SEC_CONST_32BIT GPT_STOP_SEC_CONST_32BIT Gpt_kConfigPtr
GPT_START_SEC_VAR_FAST_32BIT GPT_STOP_SEC_VAR_FAST_32BIT Gpt_WakeupChannelInfo
GPT_START_SEC_VAR_8BIT GPT_STOP_SEC_VAR_8BIT Gpt_DriverMode, Gpt_ChannelIndex, Gpt_ChannelIdentifier, QMChannelStatus variable, QM Notification flags if notification enabled

 

Table 4: ASIL B SFR and Memory Range
Start Address End Address Remarks
GTM_TOMi_CHx_CTRL/GTM_ATOMi_CHx_CTRL GTM_TOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN/GTM_ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN Refer Table 2 for respective GTM Module, Module number(i) and Channel number(x)
GTM_TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_CTRL/GTM_ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_CTRL GTM_TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_STAT/GTM_ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_CTRL Refer Table 2 for respective GTM Module, Module number(i). TGC number(y) will be 0 if Channel number <= 7, TGC number(y) will be 1 if Channel number > 7
GPT_START_SEC_ASIL0_VAR_8BIT GPT_STOP_SEC_ASIL0_VAR_8BIT AsilChannelStatus variable, ASIL Notification flags if notification enabled

 

Table 5: QM SFR and Memory Range
Start Address End Address Remarks
GTM_TOMi_CHx_CTRL/GTM_ATOMi_CHx_CTRL GTM_TOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN/GTM_ATOMi_CHx_IRQ_EN Refer Table 2 for respective GTM Module, Module number(i) and Channel number(x)
GTM_TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_CTRL/GTM_ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_CTRL GTM_TOMi_TGCy_ENDIS_STAT/GTM_ATOMi_AGC_ENDIS_CTRL Refer Table 2 for respective GTM Module, Module number(i). TGC number(y) will be 0 if Channel number <= 7, TGC number(y) will be 1 if Channel number > 7
